entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-03-08
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [Blazor] Using event callbacks in backing classes #47098
  • API proposal: Razor Component IResult #47096
    8.0-preview3
  • Query binding with default values inconsistent #47095
  • Add helper methods for constructing a RazorComponentResult #47094
    .NET 8 Planning
  • APP_POOL_ID environmental variable is null before app.Run() runs for some time. #47093
  • JObject as api result, but return a null array #47091
  • @onclick not invoked on <a> tags when in disabled fieldset #47090
  • InputSelect with empty option doesn't validate int #47088

Closed

  • Testing issue labeler work by immitating a real Blazor issue #47103
  • [SignalR] Server doesn't stop streaming after cancellation on client #46861
    8.0-preview3
  • built-in Rate Limiting middleware in .Net 7 #46974
  • TFM trimming, and elimination of net4* targeting in Linux source-build #43696
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Blazor Sections API Proposal #46937
    8.0-preview3
  • Sections support in Blazor #28182
    8.0-preview3
  • Components E2E consistently timing out in 7.0 and 6.0 #47080
  • HotReload causing runtime issue #37504
    Backlog
  • Multiple Kestrel Libuv tests failing in 6.0 on win-arm64 #47078
  • Basic discovery of endpoints #46978
    8.0-preview3
  • Port dotnet-run's DOTNET_ROOT changes to dotnet-watch #35793
    .NET 8 Planning
  • 'dotnet watch run' for a console app keeps restarting after one modification #38064
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Blazor Routes API Request to Page #46850
  • Support inferring parameters bound from JSON body or service #46786
    8.0-preview3
  • Problem with `dotnet watch` and `launchSettings.json` #46596

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix Linux-Musl Composite Artifacts not being built #47104
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-preview3
  • Follow up on IParsable changes and update tests #47102
    area-runtime
  • Use IProblemDetailsService in ProblemHttpResult #47100
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • [release/7.0] Fix canceling flush of CancelInvocation when canceling server-to-client stream #47099
    Servicing-consider, area-signalr, 7.0.x
  • Only invoke 'IsService' check once in resolution #47097
    area-runtime
  • Issue 33368, Solution to resolve "System.InvalidOperationException" inside "HandleForbiddenAsync" method. #47089
    area-security, community-contribution
  • RDG array handling. #47086
    area-runtime
  • Initial implementation of filtered full composite image #47085
    area-infrastructure

Merged

  • Remove some Linq usages from Kestrel.Core #47012
    area-runtime, 8.0-preview3
  • Fix canceling flush of CancelInvocation when canceling server-to-client stream #46870
    area-signalr, 8.0-preview3
  • Trim away netframework targets in source-build #47101
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-preview3
  • Fix SkipHelixArm condition #47083
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 6.0.16
  • [release/7.0] Prevent NRE when body is not set #46613
    Servicing-approved, area-runtime, pending-ci-rerun, 7.0.5
  • Consolidate RDF and RDG tests (part 1) #47011
    area-runtime, 8.0-preview3
  • Fix HRESULT check for IIS file watcher #47081
    servers-iis, area-runtime, 8.0-preview3
  • Sections support #46727
    area-blazor, 8.0-preview3
  • Remove some Linq usages from Routing #47004
    area-runtime, 8.0-preview3
  • Add support for JSON body vs. service inference #47079
    area-runtime, 8.0-preview3
  • [release/6.0] Use new Chromium headless mode to fix E2E test timeouts (#46812) #47084
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 6.0.16
  • [release/7.0] Use new Chromium headless mode to fix E2E test timeouts (#46812) #47082
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 7.0.5
  • Add the standard set of TryParsable tests to implicity route/query. #47068
    area-runtime, 8.0-preview3

Updated

  • Implement request timeout middleware #46115
    area-runtime, community-contribution, blog-candidate
  • Set InvariantGlobalization in api template #47066
    area-mvc
  • Add generic variants of MVC attributes #47075
  • [release/7.0] Don't throw exception for unresolved type #46078
    area-runtime, pending-ci-rerun
  • [release/7.0] Add support for JSON output to more `user-jwts` commands #45431
    Servicing-consider, area-commandlinetools, area-web-frameworks
  • [release/7.0] Prefer TypeConverter over TryParse #46687
    Servicing-consider, area-web-frameworks, 7.0.x
  • [release/7.0] Fail client result if client can't parse invocation argument(s) #47003
    Servicing-consider, area-signalr, 7.0.x
  • Razor Component IResult #47023
    area-mvc, area-blazor, 8.0-preview3
  • Add short circuit in routing #46713
    area-runtime, community-contribution
